entry.title: Architex Crest Turtle Beach Ribbed Boucle Stripe Upholstery Fabric
entry.summary:
Vendor: Architex
Type: Upholstery Fabric
Price: 1.00 - 14.50 (2 variants)

Description

Colorful boucle stripes are ribbed in gray with beige dots across a dark gray background. With a protective finish, this outdoor upholstery fabric provides texture and style that with outlast the wear and tear of high traffic areas.

  • Summary
  • Details
Fabric Name Crest Turtle Beach
ID Number 150921-99102YD
Color Gray
Width 54"
Pattern Repeat 3.4” Horizontal, 5.5” Vertical
Fiber Contents 100% Solution Dyed Nylon
Vendor Architex
Finish: Nanotex®
Backing: Durablock
Fire Codes: This Textile Meets All Appropriate Flammability Requirements For Seating.
Abrasion: 400,000
Cleaning: WS: Clean with either water or solvent based products. Use a mild solvent, an upholstery shampoo, or the foam from a mild detergent. Do not saturate.
Additional Information: Part of the Remedé Upholstery collection. Lightfastness: 500 Hours Aatcc 16. Nano-Tex covalently bonds to the fiber of the textile and lasts the life of the fabric. It is effective at preventing fabric stains from dirt and spills including coffee, soda, wine, mustard, salad dressing, blood, urine and iodine. With the DuraBlock backing, no liquid can travel through the fabric; even under high pressure.
